episodes.title: Cult Dynamics | Cult Behavior in Everyday Life w/ Daniella Mestyanek Young | The TLB Pod 111
episodes.description: On Episode 111 of The TLB Podcast, James speaks with Daniella Mestyanek Young, a Military veteran, organizational psychologist, cult survivor, and author and scholar of cults and extreme groups, and the pair discuss the importance of recognizing and addressing the influence of bad groups and leaders in contemporary society, the intricate dynamics cult ideology, community, and the societal structures that lead to coercive control, the role of capitalism in perpetuating cult-like behaviors, and the psychological effects of living in a society operating on cult dynamics.
